isExpired

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isExpired
READONLY: Determines whether the ReferenceTable is expired. Expired ReferenceTables should be recreated from its definition since its records might be no longer valid

fromJson

public void fromJson(String jsonString)
Converts this json string to the reference table. Notes: for the date/time, support '/Date(milliseconds)', also support all Java date format (like 'yyyy/MM/dd' etc). if no json format specified, ISO-8601 standard: 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ' is assumed for DateTiime, 'yyyy-MM-dd' is assumed for Date, could be GMT/UTC time like 2012-06-01T03:04:05.132Z, or time in specific timezone like 2012-060-01T03:04:05.123+0400.

Parameters:
jsonString - json String

toJson

public String toJson(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean excludeHeader)
Converts the reference table to Json String, Notes: (1). Date or DateTime in its json date format (which is specified in its 'json format', ie, yyyy/MM/dd); if no date json format specified, default is GMT/UTC time in ISO-8601 standard: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ for DateTime, yyyy-MM-dd for Date. the json format could also be '/Date', which should be '/Date(milliseconds)' format. (2). Escape: \ -> \\ " -> \" \r -> \\r \n -> \\n \b -> \\b \t -> \\t \f -> \\f

Overrides:
toJson in class CwObject
Parameters:
excludeHeader - boolean - exclude the reference table name in return json string.
Returns:
The Json string.
